sentences.sentence: Even an Olympic medal wouldn't make me prouder! I think children need to know that they are loved.
sentences.translation: 即便是一枚奥运奖牌也不会让我更自豪！我认为孩子们要知道他们是被爱着的。

sentences.sentence: So I couldn't be prouder of all of you.
sentences.translation: 我为你们感到无比骄傲。

sentences.sentence: It all leads to a prouder, more committed workforce.
sentences.translation: 这一切都…一个更加骄傲的，更加忠诚的员工。
